articles.title: NFL conference championship weekend preview
articles.description: The stage is set for the AFL and NFL conference championship games as four teams look to punch their ticket to Super Bowl LVII. John Dickerson is joined by CBS Sports NFL analyst and former Super Bowl champion Ryan Harris to preview Championship Sunday.
